data.description: Output template data in a test-friendly form
data.PS: The following links are only valid for module list maintainers:
data.rationale:
Testing CGIs is difficult to do automatically because of all the
    extra design surrounding their output that has nothing to do with
    the actual functionality of the code. This module allows
    HTML::Template-based programs to give a serialized output that can
    be easily parsed for test scripts.
